name: Crystal Garden (peterzak)
description:
PC game, first-person perspective, this was a small project at the end of the first year. The goal was to pick an artist from a list and make a game about his art or make a game with his artwork.

The artist I picked was Raqib Shaw, his paintings are mostly about paradise and how he is imagining the paradise. In the game, I used all of his art as platforms, skybox, terrain.
